title: AUDRON: A Deep Learning Framework with Fused Acoustic Signatures for Drone Type Recognition
summary: Unmanned aerial vehicles (UAVs), commonly known as drones, are increasingly used across diverse domains, including logistics, agriculture, surveillance, and defense. While these systems provide numerous benefits, their misuse raises safety and security concerns, making effective detection mechanisms essential.
